snippet: When a rocket crashed into a building in Kiryat Malachi, or City of Angels, on Thursday morning, it inflicted the first Israeli casualties in this round of violence.
lead_paragraph: When a rocket crashed into a building in Kiryat Malachi, or City of Angels, on Thursday morning, it inflicted the first Israeli casualties in this round of violence.

headline.seo: In Israeli Border Town, Rubble and Blood
headline.main: In Israeli Border Town,  Rubble and Blood
headline.print_headline: In Israeli Border Town, ‘Fireworks’ End in Rubble and Blood
